content:
Web search results:

[1] "Every day we see more communities coming to Discord: servers about Harry Potter, the Cosmere, hip-hop, sneakers, programming, My Hero Academia, Taylor Swift, and more. Some of the many servers in Server Discovery, with more being added every day. Its been a thrill watching you all build."
URL: https://discord.com/blog/discord-is-for-your-communities

[2] "In order to enable Community for your Discord server, you are required to have the following settings enabled in order to ensure safety in the community: Safety Checks Verification Level Setting Members of the server must have a verified email on their Discord account before sending messages or DMing anyone in the server."
URL: https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/360047132851-Enabling-Your-Community-Server

[3] "With the Discord app or website open, click on your Community servers name to bring up the drop-down menu and select Server Settings. Select the Welcome Screen under the Community section on the left-hand column, and then click the Set Up Welcome Screen button on the right-hand side."
URL: https://www.howtogeek.com/739355/how-to-set-up-a-community-server-on-discord/

[4] "As a workaround, Discord allows you to add any running application or game to activity detection. Go to your User Settings (the gear icon next to your name in the bottom-left corner), then click the Registered Games tab on the left side. From this menu, you can click Add it to add any app or game youre running, which will then be ..."
URL: https://www.howtogeek.com/853659/10-discord-features-you-should-be-using/

[5] "Stage Discovery was built as a way for communities to showcase events to the global Discord user base and to invite potential new members into their community. Its been rolled out to a few countries in a pilot form over the past few months. Focusing on the Future of Communities"
URL: https://discord.com/blog/whats-next-for-communities-at-discord

[6] "Video Calls Reduced Motion Setting Go Live and Screen Share Custom Status Server Folders 101 Channel Following FAQ Server Discovery Spellcheck in Discord Server Ownership - The Crown Icon Spotify FAQ Listening Along with Spotify Spotify Auto Pause Game Invites and Detailed Status (Rich Presence) What is Server Indexing? Intro to Webhooks"
URL: https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/sections/201110577-Features

[7] "New Discord feature! Discord Voice chat Instant Messaging Client Social media Mobile app Software Information communications technology Technology. To all those whore gonna ask how to get it: its still in beta and is given to a few RANDOM servers. However if you wanna experience it join discords games lab server or invite the ..."
URL: https://www.reddit.com/r/discordapp/comments/sp88qq/new\_discord\_feature/

[8] "Sep 14, 2022, 9:00 AM PDT. Discord Forum Channels will be available across PC and mobile. Image: Discord. Discord is launching its new Forum Channels feature today in a bid to help server owners ..."
URL: https://www.theverge.com/2022/9/14/23352840/discord-forum-channels-rollout-availability

[9] "Discord communities will be able to create tiered perks, view analytics on member engagement, and lock channels or even entire servers to paying subscribers. Discords new Premium Memberships..."
URL: https://www.theverge.com/2021/12/7/22822042/discord-premium-memberships-creators-monetize-servers-feature

[10] "Public forums offer so much data for free, now Google will have to pay for it. Discord already gives tons of data to facebook. tbh, even in the implementation Guilded had, with no way to search (even in normal text channels), searching for content is kinda easy to do. If this will not be placed behind the nitro paywall, chances are r/guilded ..."
URL: https://www.reddit.com/r/discordapp/comments/u9y02m/overview\_of\_forum\_channels\_new\_feature/
Current date: 3/6/2023

Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given query. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Query: What we can provide to the community with the discord feature?
